title: 互联网时代语音识别基本问题
excerpt: [摘要]: 语音识别技术经过半个世纪的积累, 于近年来达到大规模商用水平. 本文概括了统计语音识别理论的发展状况, 并单独介绍了深度神经网络在声学建模, 语言建模, 多语言共享, 语义识别等方面的卓越性能. 深度神经网络的性能优势引起了我们强烈的兴趣. 通过回顾类人 ...
authors: 柯登峰， 徐波 - 中国科学: 信息科学

title: Learning where to attend with deep architectures for image tracking
excerpt: We discuss an attentional model for simultaneous object tracking and recognition that is driven by gaze data. Motivated by theories of perception, the model consists of two interacting pathways, identity and control, intended to mirror the what and where pathways  ...
authors: M Denil, L Bazzani, H Larochelle, N de Freitas - Neural computation
